mapper.select: /*通过id查询一个*/ select * from user where id=#{id}
/*通过用户名查询一个*/ select * from user where username=#{username}
mapper.insert: /*添加对象*/ insert into user(username,password,tele) values(#{username},#{password},#{tele})
mapper.update: /*修改对象*/ update user set id=#{id},username=#{username},password=#{password},tele=#{tele},grade_id=#{grade_id} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: /*删除对象*/ delete from user where id=#{id}
